name: com.ucl.ubiq
description: Create networked VR experiences with Ubiq

samples.description: Small examples of Ubiq in action. Demonstrates basic features in isolation.
Fully-featured social demo for VR. Will add dependencies: • com.unity.xr.interaction.toolkit

Alternative player prefab for WebXR (and standard) build target(s). Compatible with XRI. Will add dependencies: • com.unity.xr.interaction.toolkit • com.de-panther.webxr • com.de-panther.webxr-interactions
Support for for Ready Player Me avatar system. Currently only works with HalfBody avatars. Will add dependencies: • com.readyplayerme.core • com.atteneder.gltfast
